item.title: Dynamic System Integration and Plotting with C++
item.description: Intro This is a quick demonstration on how to solve a state representation with the Euler method, collecting the values, and then plotting them. I didn’t found a solution that wasn’t easy out there so I thought on getting the easy to integrate plotting library and a good math-algebra library to work with. This is based on some work I did before with simulation. There’s some potential on expanding this, which I’ll do once I have more time.
